AboutMe.title: Greetings!
AboutMe.opening: I'm a developer with 4 years of experience in JavaScript. I enjoy coding and always strive to build systems that are simple, optimized, and professional. I'm dedicated to my work, friendly, and a strong team player.

quite.label: Motto:
quite.text: When I take on a job, I make sure it's done.

stacksFe.techs: ReactJS (NextJS, Hook, Redux Toolkit), Bootstrap, Antd, TailwindCSS, Axios and other technologies.

stacksBe.techs: NodeJS (ExpressJS), MongoDB, MySQL, Redis and other technologies.

jobInsurance.title: Agency insurance mobile app
jobInsurance.description: Developed a mobile application using React Native to help insurance agents manage clients, track individual and team performance targets, provide sales consultations, participate in marketing campaigns, and stay updated with internal news.
jobInsurance.bullet1: Built UI with React Native, wrote tests using Jest-Cucumber
jobInsurance.bullet2: Proposed and implemented technical solutions, estimate, review & merge PR
jobInsurance.bullet3: Supported onboarding and collaborated closely with backend, tester, BA
jobInsurance.bullet4: Communicated directly with client to clarify requirements and resolved issues

jobCreditCard.title: Credit App
jobCreditCard.description: Developed a recommendation system for loans and promotions tailored to end users, based on facial recognition and ID card data. The system includes four platforms: a web admin portal for clients, a web admin portal for partner banks, a SPA web app, and a mobile app for end users.
jobCreditCard.bullet1: Built UI with ReactJS & React Native, wrote tests using Jest
jobCreditCard.bullet3: Collaborated closely with backend, testers, and BAs for delivery

jobMigrate.title: Startup Hundr Tech
jobMigrate.description: Redesigned the web UI by migrating from a legacy stack (HTML/CSS/jQuery) to ReactJS, aiming to enhance performance, reusability, maintainability, and scalability.
jobMigrate.bullet1: Built UI with ReactJS & Bootstrap following tasks
jobMigrate.bullet2: Proposed and implemented technical solutions that fit requirements
jobMigrate.bullet3: Worked with backend if the Project need migrate both side

Interests.indie: I'm a big fan of indie games. Even though they often lack flashy GPU-eater graphics, they shine with creative artistry and truly unique gameplay experiences.
